start: Uwhee hee hee, this conveniently placed chamber is the perfect launch point for my insidious plan!
You get rid of one villain and another appears to take his place.

end: So this guy has the power to shrink people, and he decides to rob a third-rate bank?
Obviously he's a man of high ambitions.
